fields.name: Poacher's Knife
fields.description: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Scavenging Smite: When you Smite a large monster in the enemy jungle, you gain half a charge of Smite. If you kill that monster, you gain +20 bonus Gold, and you gain 175% increased Movement Speed decaying over 2 seconds. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item
